```
$ cat httpd-pod.yaml
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: httpd
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - name: httpd-container
    image: httpd
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
```

```
$ kubectl create -f httpd-pod.yaml

$ kubectl get all
